# Fallback Event Basic

## Overview

The Fallback Event Basic component provides a simple, lightweight way to display any Nostr event type. It's designed for cases where you need a quick, clean view of an event without complex features.

## Features

- Displays event kind as a badge
- Shows NIP-31 alt tag when available
- Falls back to first 200 characters of content (truncated)
- Compact author information with avatar and timestamp
- Responsive layout with consistent styling

## Usage

Best used as a fallback display for unknown event kinds, in event lists where you need uniform cards, or when prototyping event displays.

## Best Practices

1. Use for event types without dedicated components
2. Perfect for feed views with mixed event kinds
3. Good starting point before creating specialized event cards
